#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long
#define endl "\n"
using namespace std;

int main()
{
   // freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {

        LL s,e;
        cin>>s>>e;
        LL i,n,a,b;
        cin>>n;
        vector<pair<LL,LL>> v;
        for (int i=0; i<n ; i++)
        {
            cin>>a>>b;
            v.push_back(make_pair(a,b));
        }
        //  sort(v.begin(),v.end());

//        cout<< "After sorting\n";
//        for (int i=0; i<n ; i++)
//        {
//            cout<<v[i].first<<" - "<<v[i].second<<endl;
//        }
//        cout<<endl;
        bool ans=true,ending = false;
        for (int i=0; i<n ; i++)
        {
              if(!(v[i].second<=s||v[i].first>=e))
              {
                     ans=false;
              }
        }
        if(ans==true) cout<<"YES\n";
        else cout<<"NO\n";
    }

        return 0;
    }
